ygData.subject: Re: Bertoxx Shadow Knight
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the info :) This game is so much fun. I am going to have to start limiting myself tho - I found myself online from 6:00PM until 11:30PM last night
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the info :) This game is so much fun. I am going to have
to start limiting myself tho - I found myself online from 6:00PM
until 11:30PM last night and the hours flew by :(

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Fire on High" <scendera@o...>
wrote:
> Oh yes, one other thing...there are putrid skellies in SK that give
hits
> against Blood Sabers...might want to avoid those. They're at a camp
a few
> hundred feet straight south of the zone from NK.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Fire on High <scendera@o...>
> To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
> Sent: Friday, March 28, 2003 11:02 AM
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Bertoxx Shadow Knight
>
>
> > Even if you do take hits against Guards/Merchants, it's possible
to fix
> > without having to screw up your home guild fac. Go kill gnolls in
> > Blackburrow...it raises those factions without hurting your other
ones.
> > Also, tho I'm not sure how city guards would react to you, the
Gnome
> Shadow
> > Knights are followers of Bertoxx as well and might welcome you as
a
> kindred
> > soul. Watch your ankles tho.... :-)
>
>
